artist: Delineator: Charles Eisen; Artist: Étienne Ficquet
description: portrait of Gerard de Lairesse facing right, looking left; oval frame in a sheild on stepped pedestal; painting to right of mother and child; painting to left of man kneeling next to a fire
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in black below image: C. Eisen del.   Fiquet scul. / GERARD / DE LAIRESSE / ÉLEVE DE SON PERE / RENIER DE LAIRESSE | on sheet in pencil: 1-619
title: Portrait of Gerard de Lairesse
